description: This file defines a React functional component 'ConnectJiraButton' that provides a reusable button for initiating Jira OAuth authentication flow by constructing a login URL and redirecting the user. It manages loading state and handles errors, relying on an external 'buildOAuthLoginUrl' utility function.

methods.name: ConnectJiraButton
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a button which, when clicked, constructs an OAuth login URL and navigates the browser to start Jira OAuth authentication.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Event handler for button click that builds the OAuth URL with specified parameters, sets loading state, and redirects the browser to initiate the OAuth flow. Handles errors by invoking onError callback if provided.
